homePage.LANDING_PAGE_SUB_TEXT: SBC BootMart - Your Online Food Partner
homePage.WIDE_MENU_DESC: Explore a variety of options to satisfy your cravings.
homePage.FREE_DELIVERY_DESC: Enjoy free shipping on orders above 500, straight to your door.
homePage.TOP_QUALITY_DESC: Only the best for you—top-quality products at unbeatable prices.
homePage.ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION_1: BootMart started with a vision to simplify food ordering for small-scale businesses like cafeterias, fast food outlets, and take-out services. Over time, we’ve grown into a trusted platform connecting hungry customers with the meals they love, delivered with speed and reliability.
homePage.ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION_2: Our mission is to offer an easy-to-use system that benefits both businesses and customers by providing a seamless food ordering experience, ensuring satisfaction every step of the way.
homePage.BANNER_PHOTO_DESC: BootMart is your trusted online platform for ordering delicious meals from a variety of vendors. Whether it’s a quick snack, a full meal, or a late-night craving, we’ve got you covered with fast delivery, affordable prices, and a user-friendly experience.
homePage.SHOP_FOR_DESC: Discover a variety of options to satisfy your cravings. Explore our categories below!
homePage.WHY_SHOP_CONVENIENCE: ✅ Convenience at Your Fingertips: Order your favorite meals anytime, anywhere.
homePage.WHY_SHOP_AFFORDABLE: ✅ Affordable Prices: Enjoy great deals and discounts on delicious meals.
homePage.WHY_SHOP_FAST: ✅ Fast Delivery: Get your meals delivered hot and fresh in 30 minutes or less.
homePage.WHY_SHOP_VARIETY: ✅ Variety of Choices: Choose from a wide range of cuisines and dishes.
homePage.WHY_SHOP_SECURE: ✅ Safe Transactions: Your data and payments are secure with us.
homePage.JOIN_NEWSLETTER_DESC: Get the latest updates and offers.
homePage.COPYRIGHT: COPYRIGHT © 2024, SBC BOOTMART. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

aboutUs.HISTORY_DESCRIPTION: BootMart began with a simple mission: to make food ordering quick, easy, and accessible for everyone. From humble beginnings serving college cafeterias and small take-out restaurants, we’ve grown into a trusted partner for food delivery, offering a seamless platform for businesses and customers alike.
aboutUs.OUR_SHOP_DESCRIPTION: At BootMart, we believe in the power of connection. We partner with a wide range of vendors to bring customers the meals they love, delivered with speed and reliability. Our shop is dedicated to enhancing the online food ordering experience by prioritizing customer satisfaction, secure payments, and timely deliveries.

errorPage.OPS_404: Oops! This page seems to have wandered off.

updateProductModal.ALERT_PRODUCT_MODAL: Please fill up the field that you want to update.

updateCategoryModal.SELECT_TO_UPDATE: Select a category and update its name.

deleteCategoryModal.WARNING_DELETE_CATEGORY: Warning: Deleting a category will remove it permanently!
